page.title: 07LOCAL HOUSING 2
page.content: {LOCAL HOUSING-(TWO). IN CEFN THERE IS A PUB CALLED THE DOLBEN ARMS WHICH IS VERY OLD AND WHICH NOW HAS A NEW EXTENSION WHICH IS A CHILDRENS ROOM.MOST OF THE LOCAL PEOPLE KNOW IT AS THE "BONT"BECAUSE IT IS IN BONTNEWYDD. MY HOUSE IS VERY OLD.IT'S PRESENT NAME IS"CAE PWLL"-(FIELD BY THE POND/HOLE).NEAR BY THERE ARE SOME OLD LEAD MINES.IT WAS ALSO KNOWN AS "CEUBWLL"-(CESSPIT OR POTHOLE).THE TITHE NO. IS 730(ACCORDING TO THE TITHE MAP OF 1843).AT ONE TIME THE BUILDING USED TO BE DIVIDED INTO TWO HOMES,ONE OF THEM BEING A SWEET SHOP DURING THE 2nd.WORLD WAR.OTHER OLD HOUSES CAN BE FOUND NEARBY.e.g.TAN Y GRAIG(BENEATH THE ROCK),YSGUBOR NEWYDD(NEW BARN),PANT(A HOLLOW).
